name: Gnocchi on tomato-cream sauce with mozzarella and basil

cookingInstructions.step01: Put tomato paste, tomato pesto and cream in a small pot and let it boil brefly. Afterwards, keep it cooking on the smallest level.
cookingInstructions.step02: While cutting the fresh coctail tomatos into quaters, boil about 2 L of water for the Gnocchis. Don#t forget to put salt in the water after it startet boiling.
cookingInstructions.step03: Cut mozzarella into small pieces and take off the basil lieves from the stalk.
cookingInstructions.step04: Put the fresh coctail tomatos in the sauce and the gnocchis in the water. The gnocchis are finished when swimming on the water surface.
cookingInstructions.step05: When the gnocchis are ready, pour off the water, spice up the sauce with a pinch of pepper & salt and serve the gnocchis with sauce as topping. Mozzarella and basil can be added optional.
